original_text: and to make plain to everyone the administration of this mystery, which for ages past was kept hidden in God, who created all things.
korean_text: 영원부터 만물을 창조하신 하나님 속에 감추어졌던 비밀의 경륜이 어떠한 것을 드러내게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: and to make plain to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 사람에게 분명히 알려주기 위해

sentences.original_text: which for ages past was kept hidden
